1.0.name: wordpress/wp-audiofanzine-news
1.0.description:
This widget allows you to include Audiofanzine's news feed on your Wordpress website, to provide news about musical instruments and audio gear to your visitors. Filter the news feed according to the subject that is the most relevant to you : Computer Music, Recording, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Electronic instruments, DJing or Lights. And thanks to the multilingual versions of Audiofanzine, choose between its 6 languages : english, french, german, italian, japanese and spanish.

About Audiofanzine   Audiofanzine is the only multi-specialized, multilingual and multi-content website dedicated to the pro audio and music industries. With more than 700.000 members around the world, it's a great source to find both editorial and community content. Check out http://www.audiofanzine.com and http://www.bordasmedia.com to get more information.
